title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/ENGLISH
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies, Literature in English and any other Arts subject.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies, Literature in English Language and Arts subject.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/FRENCH
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies, French and one (1) other subject.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies, French and any other subject.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/HAUSA
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government, Christian Religious Studies, Hausa and any other  Arts subject.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies and any other two (2) of Economics/Commerce, Government/History, Government/Social Studies.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies and any other of History/Government, Geography, Social Studies, Economics/Commerce.

title: FRENCH/SOCIAL STUDIES

Five (5) SSC credit passesin English Language, Mathematics, French and any two (2) of the following

1. Geography

2. Economics

3. Government

4. History

title: HAUSA/SOCIAL STUDIES

Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Hausa and any two (2) of

2. History/Government

3. Islamic Studies/Christian Religious Studies
